dcterms:description: The dataset classifies radiofrequency electromagnetic fields as possibly carcinogenic to humans based on experimental studies regarding non-thermal impacts.
dcterms:title: IARC classification of radiofrequency electromagnetic fields

dcterms:creator: National Toxicology Program
dcterms:description: This dataset includes toxicology and carcinogenesis studies in rats exposed to whole-body radio frequency radiation at a frequency (900 MHz) and modulations (GSM and CDMA) used by cell phones.
dcterms:title: National Toxicology Program study on radio frequency radiation

dcterms:creator: L. Chiaraviglio
A. Elzanaty
M.-S. Alouini
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses health risks associated with 5G exposure from a communications engineering perspective.
dcterms:title: Health risks associated with 5G exposure

dcterms:creator: A. Elzanaty
L. Chiaraviglio
M.-S. Alouini
dcterms:description: This dataset addresses misinformation regarding 5G and EMF exposure, discussing open questions and potential solutions.
dcterms:title: 5G and EMF exposure misinformation

dcterms:creator: Y. Sambo
M. Al-Imari
F. Héliot
M. Imran
dcterms:description: This dataset presents electromagnetic emission-aware schedulers for the uplink of OFDM wireless communication systems.
dcterms:title: Electromagnetic emission-aware schedulers

dcterms:creator: M. Wang
L. Lin
J. Chen
D. Jackson
W. Kainz
Y. Qi
P. Jarmuszewski
dcterms:description: This dataset evaluates and optimizes the specific absorption rate for multiantenna systems.
dcterms:title: Evaluation and optimization of specific absorption rate

dcterms:creator: Y. A. Sambo
F. Héliot
M. A. Imran
dcterms:description: This dataset provides a survey and tutorial of electromagnetic radiation and reduction in mobile communication systems.
dcterms:title: Survey and tutorial of electromagnetic radiation

dcterms:creator: Z. Lou
A. Elzanaty
M.-S. Alouini
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses the use of green tethered UAVs for EMF-aware cellular networks.
dcterms:title: Green tethered UAVs for EMF-aware cellular networks

dcterms:creator: E. Basar
M. Di Renzo
J. De Rosny
M. Debbah
M.-S. Alouini
R. Zhang
dcterms:description: This dataset covers wireless communications through reconfigurable intelligent surfaces.
dcterms:title: Wireless communications through reconfigurable intelligent surfaces

dcterms:creator: M. Najafi
V. Jamali
R. Schober
H. V. Poor
dcterms:description: This dataset presents physics-based modeling and scalable optimization of large intelligent reflecting surfaces.
dcterms:title: Physics-based modeling and scalable optimization of large intelligent reflecting surfaces

dcterms:creator: G. Vermeeren

dcterms:description: This dataset defines a global wireless exposure metric for low EMF exposure future networks.
dcterms:title: Low EMF exposure future networks
